website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung Galaxy S8+ is a larger version of the excellent Galaxy S8, trading a slightly bigger battery for a form factor that isn't as easy to use in one hand.
pros: Longer battery life than the Galaxy S8
cons: Bigger, heavier, and more expensive than the Galaxy S8

customer_reviews.title: The S8+ is by far the best phone I've used so far - very fast
customer_reviews.text: I've used a lot of Galaxy phones so far. My last one was S6 Edge+, I didn't think Samsung can produce something that tops it, but they've apparently done it. The S8+ is by far the best phone I've used so far - very fast, nicely looking, and the iris recognition is awesome. Saves you a lot of time and frustration as you can use it for business and not have to enter long passwords, which are typically required by your enterprise administrators. Awesome handset!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: phone is one of best I have every had
customer_reviews.text: phone is one of best I have every had, but they wont help if you have problem's whit phone it feel out of my pocket an screen broke said that has nothing to do with them would not help or work with me to fix. I called Samsung they said they would be happy to repair it for free but the phone was not registered an sense it was a international version phone they well not be able to help me.i would not have bought phone if I new they would not back the phone if you had problems with them .well not buy from these people again.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth e.sticken

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with my phone. I know it was used, and lucky for me it wasn't beat up bad, slight paint chip on bottom where headphone jack is (I put into a phone case so its a non issue) but other than that, just what I was looking for. Im with MetroPCS, I had to call them and give IMEI and Sim number and was connected less than 6 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Cell Phone
customer_reviews.text: This is the most fantastic phone I have ever owned. Great software makes operation easy and intuative

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with my purchase, the only thing I did not like was to wait 15 days to receive the package.

customer_reviews.title: FAKE Galaxy S8 Plus Phone! DO NOT BUY FROM HERE!
customer_reviews.text: This Galaxy S8 Plus from DigitalTechno it's a fake Galaxy S8 Plus that comes from China not Vietnam. The seal of the box is generic one, not from Samsung because the phones are updated in 2019 and they were made in 2017 so how come the software got updated if the phone is meant to be "BRAND NEW"? FAKE! I guess they are just used or refurbished. Do not buy from here. Rather buy with Samsung or get a phone on contract to have warranty as this seller doesn't cover any waranty. Check the 2 pictures that shows the fake phone labels against an original phone. You can see the fake seal too.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Great phone. Am coming from Windows Phone 950XL this ...
customer_reviews.text: Received my Galaxy S8+ one day early (Why do they call it an S8 Plus?). EU model so the mains USB charger plug is only a two-pin continental style plug. Though this will fit into a UK shaver plug with no problem. Great phone. Am coming from Windows Phone 950XL this due to many of the Windows apps been discontinued by many companies, also many apps only on Apple or Android. Again, Great phone. Buy one now.
customer_reviews.author: johnf23

customer_reviews.title: Why was my phone imported from Hungary?
customer_reviews.text: My phone was supplied by Euronics and when I opened it up all the instructions were in Hungarian. Luckily I was able to change the phone back into English. I cannot really understand why this phone was imported from Hungary in the first place. Apart from this I am pleased with the phone which seems to be working ok and I am especially pleased with the camera which takes lovely pictures.
customer_reviews.author: P. Reading

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, only problem is getting a tempered glass ...
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, only problem is getting a tempered glass screen they all seem to come off after a week or let dust underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Mickyb

customer_reviews.title: Great pictures
customer_reviews.text: I already have this phone and wanted the same for my partner so she could take loads of photos and not worry about hitting capacity. It's a great all rounder and the photos it takes are very good.
customer_reviews.author: Romeo Tango

customer_reviews.title: That it does what you want it to.
customer_reviews.text: It was by some tech mags given better reviews than the iPhone which is why I bought it. I found it not easy to use and at some times annoying. It had a complete update overnight and I am hoping that has improved. My main complaint is that when checking something I.e. anything the slightest accidental touch with Palm or finger anywhere and it switches to on page.
customer_reviews.author: Ralphious2

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good battery life and pretty fast
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good battery life and pretty fast. Screen is very fragile though. Even with a good quality leather flip case, a drop of 1m onto pea gravel cause chips and a crack. Keyboard is fiddly for such a large screen, making for far more typos than I used to get with my Samsung Note 4
customer_reviews.author: Bertiegood

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but has its drawbacks, eg, NO SELFIES!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I like the phone; however, it has two quite significant drawbacks: first, the selfie mode on the phone does not work, and any attempts to use it cause the camera app to shut down completely. I don't tend to take selfies, but I know this would be a big let-down for many people. Second, the battery life of the phone is not very good (compared with my Galaxy S6 that I had previously). It needs to be charged every night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simply brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to replace a broken Sony Xperia. This phone makes me realise just how much I miss Samsung phones. This is a cracking phone. Does everything I want it to, and does it well. Great screen, great interface and fantastic battery life. Build quality is epic, however I would advise strongly to affix a screen protector to it and a reasonably durable case. Mainly because I would be gutted to damage this beauty.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Chaplin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone
customer_reviews.text: Few months down the line and battery life is tanking. I come to expect this form modern smart phones and Samsungs in particular though. A factory reset can help, but until battery or charging technology meets or surpasses the rest of the technology then it will always be a problem. The phone itself is amazing, quick and very capable of meeting all my needs from it.
customer_reviews.author: Ðemô

customer_reviews.title: and I feel like I'm going to get at least a few years ...
customer_reviews.text: An incredible phone. Which is definitely worth the money if you're in the market for a new phone. This is likely going to be my last Phone purchase for a while, especially considering the prices phones are going up to now. and I feel like I'm going to get at least a few years out of this one before I have to move on. TLDR: Great phone, easily worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Insidific

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!!!

The Camera is very good and I am so pleased with every thing this phone offers. Good Battery life. Would buy from this seller again as it was a very smooth transaction. Thank you

I was hesitant as first to order for this, I did anyway, unknown it was a used phone. When I got the phone, was really surprised it was all shaded of new and crisp clear, it can go for a new phone .. so nice and good, and that's what I'm using to type.... Well done 4 gadgets, a happy customer here.

customer_reviews.title: Overall happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Long battery life, biiiiig screen, great camera (ok front camera) Unfortunately curved screen means a screen protector plus an actual protective case (not just the little fashion ones) creates for unattractive screen protector bubbles on the sides that just dont go away

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: a big improvement on my s6 does far more than I can manage......battery lasts far longer than my last 2 phones.. I wouldand will do anything you want to do.... buy this phone again as it feels good to hold

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I've ever owned by miles
customer_reviews.text: Best phone I've ever owned by miles. Fluid, responsive with a pretty GUI. Screen is big but that doesn't mean you can cram in lots of widgets. They seem to scale up to fit the bigger screen but this is just nit picking. Bixby is crap but what do you expect. Just use Google assist.

customer_reviews.title: Just brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Still brilliant after 2 years. Not sure you'll notice the difference with a later model. Excellent blue tooth, camera, connectivity and waterproof.

customer_reviews.title: fraud!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this phone believing that it is a new one to a very good price. After 4 weeks use it started to have a problem and eventually the screen did no more lit up. I sent it to Samsung . They told me I have no warranty because the phone was used form someone before and was already repaired. This was not declared. I got the phone in a box with 'original' seal. I call this a fraud!!!

It's nice to hold, not slippy even though it's made of glass but I'd recommend getting a good case for that added peace of mind just incase of accidental drops.

customer_reviews.text: Battery life is only average, however all other features are excellent. Transferring files from previous phone was total simplicity, so far no regrets with purchase.

customer_reviews.title: easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: transfering data, contacts etc really easy using the samsung app face recognition really good. Not used fingerprint reader as yet. Dont rely on fingerprint reader if you use a lot of sandpaper for decorating etc, some glues on the finger will stop the reader working!!
customer_reviews.author: C A Young

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a year now. Doing great, I've not had any issues with it. Love the big screen! Some people seem to dislike the fingerprint sensor, but I have fairly long fingers, so it fits me perfectly :)
customer_reviews.author: Mischa Schwieger

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely brilliant. Ordered on Thursday and it was due to ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely brilliant. Ordered on Thursday and it was due to arrive on Monday. It arrived today (Saturday). Mint in box. Warranty included. Amazing phone and amazing timescales!

customer_reviews.title: Condition.

Cause of the long side, the wide looks thin but actually the width is nealy same as the iPhone plus. The main camera is the best feature ever. It is better than real. Means it is different from the real one but really happy for the photos from S8+.

Updates also arrive quickly for newer versions of Android which is one of the reasons I adore this product.

product_meta.title: Samsung S8 Plus UK SIM-Free Smartphone - Midnight Black
product_meta.description:
The revolutionary design of the Galaxy S8 Plus begins from the inside out. We rethought every part of the phone's layout to break through the confines of the smartphone screen. So all you see is pure content and no bezel. It's the biggest, most immersive screen on a Galaxy smartphone of this size. And it's easy to hold in one hand. Camera Features: VDIS (Video Digital Image Stabilization), HDR (High Dynamic Range), Selective focus (Bokeh effect), Virtual shot, Motion photo, Filters, Stickers, Stamps, Grid line, Location tags, Timer, Quick launch, Voice control. Rear Camera Pro mode - Panorama, Slow motion, Hyperlapse, Food mode, Save as RAW file. Infinity Display: a bezel-less, full-frontal, edge-to-edge screen. Default resolution is Full HD+ and can be changed to Quad HD+(WQHD+) in Settings. Screen measured diagonally as a full rectangle without accounting for the rounded corners. Video Recording: 4K video recording at 30 fps, 1080p HD video recording at 30 fps or 60 fps, 720p HD video recording at 30 fps, VDIS (Video Digital Image Stabilization), Digital Zoom 8x, High CRI LED Flash, Slow Motion video support for 720p at 240 fps, Hyperlapse video with stabilization, Continuous Autofocus video, Face Detection, Tracking AF, Take 9-megapixel still photos while recording 4K video, Playback Zoom, Video Location tags

BOX CONTAINS
Samsung S8 Plus Midnight Black, USB Cable, Earphone, Ejection pin, USB power adaptor, Earphone, Quick start guide, USB Connector (USB Type-C), Micro USB Connector
feature_bullets: Infinity Display: Get ready for a fully immersive experience, thanks to the Galaxy S8’s ultrathin bezel and 18.5:9 ratio display. No physical home button
Intuitive intelligence: Bixby AI assistant your own personal assistant and info services through Bixby Vision
Locked-down security: Iris scanner gives great protection for your personal information without compromising convenience. Rear fingerprint scanner
Control all of your Samsung smart devices remotely with Samsung Connect. Fast and wireless charging support
Stunning shots, every time: Dual Pixel 12MP camera with F1.7 lens, enhanced image processing and facial recognition for smart autofocus. The 8MP front camera guarantees a perfect selfie
